Reacting with profanity and visible distress after game ends, losing composure in public.
Drinking quickly to steady himself, signaling some loss of control under pressure.
Despite emotional turmoil, responds quickly to pager and cell phone, indicating ability to switch focus and attend to important matters.

Turns off the camera and refuses to engage in light conversation, showing discomfort or withdrawal.
